articles.title: Metaverse In Numbers: How Vietnam Is Fueling The Crypto Game Boom - Forbes
articles.description: Vietnam is the home to Axie Infinity, the biggest crypto game that has gained massive popularity across Southeast Asia.
articles.content: Vietnam is the home to Axie Infinity, the biggest crypto game that has gained massive popularity across Southeast Asia. As a result of its explosive growth, the demand for blockchain games in Vietnam… [+460 chars]

articles.title: India delivers 1 billion COVID-19 vaccine doses as health officials hope worst of pandemic has passed - CBC.ca
articles.description: India has administered one billion doses of COVID-19 vaccine, officials said Thursday, passing a milestone for the South Asian country where the delta variant fuelled its first crushing surge earlier this year.

articles.title: Singaporean Shirin Hamid appointed chief information officer of IMF - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A Singaporean has been appointed as the International Monetary Fund's (IMF) chief information officer (CIO) and information technology department director.
